item.title: Garden Plot: Plant now to have blooms throughout spring
item.description: We’ve recently had some nice soaking rains to moisten the soil, making it a great time to plant some spring bloomers.
item.dc:creator: Diane Lynch

item.title: New murals from Bay Area artists decorate Strawberry Village
item.description: Visitors to Strawberry Village will see new splashes of color throughout the center in the form of three murals by Bay Area artists.
item.dc:creator: Naomi Friedland

item.title: Strawberry artist depicts portraits of luck through lottery scratchers
item.description: Strawberry artist Ben Benet found inspiration for one of his recent projects in his experiences playing lottery scratchers.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Students transform Bel Aire into chocolate factory for ‘Willy Wonka’ spring play
item.description: Bel Aire Elementary School students will transport audiences to a world of pure imagination in their production of “Willy Wonka Jr."
item.dc:creator: Emily Lavin

item.title: Marin supervisors revise housing plans to meet court, state requirements
item.description: Officials removed controversial “precedence clauses” while adding new fair-housing language.
item.dc:creator: Naomi Friedland

item.title: Tiburon names three new faces to diversity, parks and design boards
item.description: The Tiburon Town Council appointed Lina Godfrey, Mike Ghaffary and Phoebe Holscher.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Rare beach-access lot hits the market for $3.995 mil
item.description: The rare waterfront lot on Paradise Drive has beach access and approved plans for a 6,500-square-foot home.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Local teens help launch prom boutique to make attire accessible to all
item.description: Two local teens are leading an effort to ensure all high-school students can afford to look their best at prom.
item.dc:creator: Naomi Friedland

item.title: Award-winning S.F. bakery Tartine to return to Mill Valley roots at Strawberry Village
item.description: Renowned Bay Area bakery Tartine will make its Marin debut at the Strawberry Village shopping center later this year.
item.dc:creator: Naomi Friedland
